data.text:
Recognizing our biases is an ongoing challenge, but a necessary one. When it comes to global news, Ground News offers a fresh perspective. I‚Äôve found it to be a valuable and novel way to better understand what's happening in the world. Use my invite code 2485786 and see if you agree. Download the app here: https://lnkd.in/dWnEs6xu #GroundNews #GlobalNews #MediaBias

***Feature of the week*** Dynamic form population - what is it and why is it good for you? Firstly, Rugged Data, powered by The Hub, provides a two-way flow of information which means that you can enter data into The Hub and it will automatically appear in the mobile app. That could be information such as, site address, contact information, asset details and loads more. What this means for you is that technicians have less manual data entry to do at the mobile end and this reduction of effort simplifies the job and saves you bags of time. Want to take a look at how a process app like Rugged Data could help your business? We'd love to show you. Reach out to the team on 01202 122691. #simplicity #efficiency #processimprovement
